results.name: Involution of natural numbers: A057501-conjugate of A057164.
comment: Note: This is isomorphic with Meeussen's "skewcatacycleft" operation acting on the interpretation (gg) of the exercise 19 by Stanley.
link: Index entries for signature-permutations induced by Catalan automorphisms
R. P. Stanley, Exercises on Catalan and Related Numbers
xref: Number of cycles: A007123. Number of fixed-points: A001405. Max. cycle size: A046698. LCM of cycle sizes: A046698. (In range [A014137(n-1)..A014138(n-1)] of this permutation, possibly shifted one term left or right).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 17 2003. Proposed by _Wouter Meeussen_ in Dec 15 2001.
